entities.name: department of mysteries
entities.description: The department where Potter is being summoned by Snape. ("There are many things in the De partment of Mysteries...")

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Harry Potter, a student at Hogwarts. ("Potter, few of which you would understand and none of which concern you...")

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Severus Snape, a teacher at Hogwarts. ("do I make myself plain?", "You are to rid your mind of all emotion every night before sleep...")

entities.name: ron and hermione
entities.description: Harry's friends Ron and Hermione. ("find Ron and Hermione.")

relationships.description: Potter is being summoned to the Department of Mysteries. ("I want you back here same time on Wednesday, and we will continue work then.")
Snape is instructing Potter to rid his mind of all emotion every night before sleep. ("You are to rid your mind of all emotion every night before sleep...")
Snape is warning Potter that he will know if Potter has not practiced. ("And be warned, Potter . . . I shall know if you have not practiced...")
